primary.context: Caller wanted to pay a balance of $1,484.81 for Vacation Village at Bonaventure
primary.detail: The AI successfully verified the account and balance but failed to send the payment link, resulting in a transfer to a queue where the caller eventually hung up.

steps: Caller requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent collected name and state for verification.
Agent identified account, balance, and contract number.
Agent confirmed phone number for link delivery.
Agent encountered a technical error while sending the link.
Agent transferred caller to the concierge department.
Caller waited in the queue through multiple hold messages before disconnecting.

impediment.detail: Agent stated there was an issue sending the information after confirming the phone number.

actions.detail: Found account for Paul Markowitz in Illinois
Verified identity via name and state
System error occurred during link generation/delivery
Transferred to concierge after task failure

insights.summary: The caller attempted to pay maintenance fees and successfully completed verification, but a technical failure prevented the AI from sending the payment link. The caller was transferred to a human queue and abandoned after several minutes of hold music.
insights.verbatim: It seems like there was an issue while sending your information. I will now transfer you to our concierge department
